verses.verse: וַיֵּאָסְפ֤וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> as one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הָ֣רְח֔וֹב <S%H7339><s%> into the street אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> the water וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and they spake לְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe לְהָבִ֗יא <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> of the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> to Israel

וַיָּבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> brought עֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> And Ezra הַ֠כֹּהֵן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָ֞ה <S%H8451><s%> the law לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before הַקָּהָל֙ <S%H6951><s%> the congregation מֵאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> both of men וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> and women וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all מֵבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> with understanding לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> and all that could hear בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> upon the first לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> of the seventh

וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> And he read בוֹ֩ לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> therein before הָרְח֜וֹב <S%H7339><s%> the street אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> the water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> from the morning עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מַחֲצִ֣ית <S%H4276><s%> half הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in נֶ֛גֶד <S%H5048><s%> the presence הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> of men וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> and the women וְהַמְּבִינִ֑ים <S%H995><s%> and those that could understand וְאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> and the ears כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> [were attentive] unto the book הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> of the law

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> stood עֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> And Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִגְדַּל־ <S%H4026><s%> upon a pulpit עֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> of wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> which they had made לַדָּבָר֒ <S%H1697><s%> for the purpose וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> him stood אֶצְל֡וֹ <S%H681><s%> and beside מַתִּתְיָ֡ה <S%H4993><s%> Mattithiah וְשֶׁ֡מַע <S%H8087><s%> and Shema וַ֠עֲנָיָה <S%H6043><s%> and Anaiah וְאוּרִיָּ֧ה <S%H223><s%> and Urijah וְחִלְקִיָּ֛ה <S%H2518><s%> and Hilkiah וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖ה <S%H4641><s%> and Maaseiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאל֗וֹ <S%H8040><s%> and on his left hand פְּ֠דָיָה <S%H6305><s%> Pedaiah וּמִֽישָׁאֵ֧ל <S%H4332><s%> and Mishael וּמַלְכִּיָּ֛ה <S%H4441><s%> and Malchiah וְחָשֻׁ֥ם <S%H2828><s%> and Hashum וְחַשְׁבַּדָּ֖נָה <S%H2806><s%> and Hashbadana זְכַרְיָ֥ה <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <S%H4918><s%> [and] Meshullam פ

וַיִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> opened עֶזְרָ֤א <S%H5830><s%> And Ezra הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> the book לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> it all the people הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וּכְפִתְח֖וֹ <S%H6605><s%> opened עָֽמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed עֶזְרָ֔א <S%H5830><s%> And Ezra אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God הַגָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the great וַיַּֽעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵ֤ן ׀ <S%H543><s%> Amen אָמֵן֙ <S%H543><s%> Amen בְּמֹ֣עַל <S%H4607><s%> with lifting up יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands וַיִּקְּד֧וּ <S%H6915><s%> and they bowed וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲוֻּ֛ <S%H7812><s%> their heads and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַפַּ֥יִם <S%H639><s%> with [their] faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground

וְיֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Also Jeshua וּבָנִ֡י <S%H1137><s%> and Bani וְשֵׁרֵ֥בְיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H8274><s%> and Sherebiah יָמִ֡ין <S%H3226><s%> Jamin עַקּ֡וּב <S%H6126><s%> Akkub שַׁבְּתַ֣י ׀ <S%H7678><s%> Shabbethai הֽוֹדִיָּ֡ה <S%H1941><s%> Hodijah מַעֲשֵׂיָ֡ה <S%H4641><s%> Maaseiah קְלִיטָ֣א <S%H7042><s%> Kelita עֲזַרְיָה֩ <S%H5838><s%> Azariah יוֹזָבָ֨ד <S%H3107><s%> Jozabad חָנָ֤ן <S%H2605><s%> Hanan פְּלָאיָה֙ <S%H6411><s%> Pelaiah וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites מְבִינִ֥ים <S%H995><s%> to understand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> caused the people לַתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> the law וְהָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עָמְדָֽם׃ <S%H5975><s%> abide

וַֽיִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> So they read בַסֵּ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God מְפֹרָ֑שׁ <S%H6567><s%> distinctly וְשׂ֣וֹם <S%H7760><s%> and gave שֶׂ֔כֶל <S%H7922><s%> the sense וַיָּבִ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> and caused [them] to understand בַּמִּקְרָֽא׃ <S%H4744><s%> the reading ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <S%H5166><s%> And Nehemiah ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַתִּרְשָׁ֡תָא <S%H8660><s%> which [is] the Tirshatha וְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> and Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3548><s%> the priest הַסֹּפֵ֡ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וְהַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites הַמְּבִינִ֨ים <S%H995><s%> that taught אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> This day קָדֹֽשׁ־ <S%H6918><s%> [is] holy הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> This לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽתְאַבְּל֖וּ <S%H56><s%> mourn וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְכּ֑וּ <S%H1058><s%> not nor weep כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for בוֹכִים֙ <S%H1058><s%> wept כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> For all the people כְּשָׁמְעָ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> when they heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> of the law

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said לָהֶ֡ם לְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> Go אִכְל֨וּ <S%H398><s%> eat מַשְׁמַנִּ֜ים <S%H4924><s%> the fat וּשְׁת֣וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink מַֽמְתַקִּ֗ים <S%H4477><s%> the sweet וְשִׁלְח֤וּ <S%H7971><s%> and send מָנוֹת֙ <S%H4490><s%> portions לְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> has nothing נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> unto them for whom nothing is prepared ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [is] holy הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for [this] day לַאֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H136><s%> to our Lord וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֣עָצֵ֔בוּ <S%H6087><s%> neither be ye sorry כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חֶדְוַ֥ת <S%H2304><s%> for the joy יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he מָֽעֻזְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H4581><s%> is your strength

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <S%H3881><s%> So the Levites מַחְשִׁ֤ים <S%H2814><s%> stilled לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> all the people לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַ֔סּוּ <S%H2013><s%> Hold your peace כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for the day קָדֹ֑שׁ <S%H6918><s%> [is] holy וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּעָצֵֽבוּ׃ <S%H6087><s%> neither be ye grieved

וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> went כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> to eat וְלִשְׁתּוֹת֙ <S%H8354><s%> and to drink וּלְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and to send מָנ֔וֹת <S%H4490><s%> portions וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to make שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> mirth גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> great כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הֵבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H995><s%> because they had understood בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הוֹדִ֖יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> that were declared לָהֶֽם׃ ס

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֡י <S%H8145><s%> And on the second נֶאֶסְפוּ֩ <S%H622><s%> were gathered together רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֶזְרָ֖א <S%H5830><s%> unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֑ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> even to understand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> of the law

וַֽיִּמְצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> And they found כָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> written בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> in the law אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> how צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> how יֵשְׁב֨וּ <S%H3427><s%> should dwell בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּסֻּכּ֛וֹת <S%H5521><s%> in booths בֶּחָ֖ג <S%H2282><s%> in the feast בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> of the seventh
